ygData.subject: Re: Dark Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: I would DEFINATELY say 2h Slasher. In my low levels i used A Bronze 2h then moved up to a 2h dwarven, to split a skull with hat is uncomperable to teh light
ygData.messageBody:
I would DEFINATELY say 2h Slasher.
In my low levels i used A Bronze 2h then moved up to a 2h dwarven, to
split a skull with hat is uncomperable to teh light damage that 1h
slas can do. I am getting myself a Bone Bladed tomorrow or so.

2hande dis best because our holy weapon is 2hs and we get dbl attack.
Also, i feel it fits teh image of a Shadow Knight.


Krimin
level 15 Dark Elf
tarew maar
